subject: female voice on scene-blacksburg
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:
--0-1881717066-1176753799=:25314
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

" i was at kent state.  this is a lot like that.  only 3 dead here , though.."  "  yes, im a student here and was a student at kent state in 1970" " i was on my way to class and ran in here"
  i quit listening then had to go do normal stuff
   
   
  possibly that will be a telling detail that will connect up with something else of an evidential nature
